body_html: Yes, they will all be automatically implemented in Java. All operations found in the C++ core are to be wrapped by classes generated at compile-time (TensorFlow-speaking) that will expose their inputs, attributes and outputs with named variables and methods.
body_text: Yes, they will all be automatically implemented in Java. All operations found in the C++ core are to be wrapped by classes generated at compile-time (TensorFlow-speaking) that will expose their inputs, attributes and outputs with named variables and methods.
body: Yes, they will all be automatically implemented in Java. All operations found in the C++ core are to be wrapped by classes generated at compile-time (TensorFlow-speaking) that will expose their inputs, attributes and outputs with named variables and methods.
